page.title: 09 ILFRACOMBE GOLF CLUB
page.content: Ilfracombe Golf Club was founded in 1892 on land acquired near Mullacott Cross.This land was good pasture and the grass grew too quickly,so many golf balls were lost.At the turn of the century it moved to the present site at Hele,where the rough land was more suitable.The site covers about 90 acres and has 18 holes.There are almost 500 members.Besides the adult section there is an active junior section.There is a club professional. In recent years the club house has been extended.It now provides the professional's shop,changing facilities with showers,a dining room and bar and a flat for the full time steward whose wife does the catering. Improvements have been made to the watering system to the greens in 1984. One of our teachers is a very keen player and gave us this information.
